title: Joint accounts on safe deposit box being levied i'm the defendant I have filed the motion to vacate judgment
question: hearing is tomorrow
answers:
You would just explain that you do not own any of the contents of the box and are on the box in name only.

BW

Do you have anything belonging to you in the box?
Was the judgment entered against you or against the co-owner.

You do not have standing to make any argument on behalf of the co-owner ob the box. The co-owner must appear and present his/her/its claims and arguments.
We can't teach you to practice law here.
